New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers won 15 straight games to begin the season, joining the 1948-49 Washington Capitols, 1993-94 Houston Rockets, and 2015-16 Golden State Warriors on the list of teams to accomplish the feat.
Key Match Events: Evan Mobley blocked Brandon Millerâ€™s dunk attempt with two minutes remaining.
Pre-Game Insights: Donovan Mitchell sat out the game to rest.
Post-Match Reflections: The Cavaliers extended their undefeated streak with a 128-114 win over the Charlotte Hornets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers scored 72 points in the first half and led the entire game.
Cleveland improved to 8-0 at home at Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse as the Hornets dropped to 5-8.
